qas.question: How many closed pubs did The Lost Pubs Project catalog?
In what year did Parliament inquire into the frequency of pub closures?
What did Parliament promise to pass as a result of increased pub closures?

answers.text: legislation to improve relations between owners and tenants

context: The Lost Pubs Project listed <a0_0>28,095<a0_0/> closed pubs on 21 April <a1_0>2015<a1_0/>, with photographs of many. In 2015 the rate of pub closures came under the scrutiny of Parliament in the UK, with a promise of <a2_0>legislation to improve relations between owners and tenants<a2_0/>.
